verses.verse: For the director.[b] On stringed instruments. A maskil of David.
When the Ziphites came to Saul and said, “David is hiding among us.”
O God, save me by your name;[c] vindicate me by your power.
Hear my prayer, O God; give ear to the words of my mouth.
Strangers[d] have risen against me; those who are ruthless seek my life, and they have no thought of God. Selah
Surely God is my helper; the LORD is the one who sustains me.
May their own evil recoil on my foes: you who are faithful, destroy them.[e]
